issue.title: Upgrade to Vert.x 4.1.2
issue.body:
This addresses #2805 

Also upgraded to Quarkus 2.0.3 and Infinispan 12.1.4
This PR is only about updating the frameworks and making the changes that are required to make our code run.
I am not 100% if we still achieve our goals that we had in mind with our own AuthHandler classes. Maybe you can have a particular look on that area @calohmn ?

I do have another PR for replacing the deprecated `ConfigProperties` class usage.

issue.title: Upgrade to vert.x 4.1.3 and Quarkus 2.2.2
issue.body:
This addresses #2805

This is basically the same as PR #2806 but uses vert.x 4.1.3, Quarkus 2.2.2 and Infinispan 12.1.7 instead.
As @dejanb had pointed out in the Hono chat on Gitter, Quarkus 2.2 is a long term support release so it seems preferable to use 2.2 instead of 2.0.

I do have another PR for replacing the deprecated ConfigProperties class usage which also addresses #2831.
